name: Word Wielder!
description:
Welcome to Word Wielder!

In this game, you are a mighty adventurer exploring the depths of a forgotten dungeon. Your only weapon? The word "Nothing".
Doing "Nothing" by itself, does exactly that: nothing. However, you build your actions using the letters that form the word "Nothing", and gain aditional letters in some actions.

Some Images

Try to see how far you can get! Hope you enjoy it, and don't forget to rate!
